import React from 'react'; import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'; import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; import Modal from '../Modal' import useStyles from './About.styles'; export default function About() { const classes = useStyles(); return ( I’m a product designer that codes. I'm currently the Product Designer, Branding Designer and Full Stack Developer at Directco. I earned my Master’s in Design with a specialisation in Branding, Illustration and Typography. After graduating I worked at a design agency (and for clients) as a Branding Designer. Since then, I branched out and learned to code, then helped to co-found our company; Directco. We have been past 5 years. I like to stay curious, enjoy nature, meditation 🎨 and the gym 🏋🏻‍♀️

More examples of my work are available upon request. Experience I'm a team player. I like to talk about ideas that have practical utility and enjoy critique for betterment. Crafting experiences and collaboration motivate me. I have 8+ years industry experience and a Masters Degree in Graphic Design. Feel free to get in touch.
Contact sean.johnson.dev@gmail.com
Wellington,
New Zealand
Design Services Brand Development & Identity
UI/UX Design
Product Design
Printed Materials
Promotional Materials
Editorial Design
Frontend + App Development ReactJS
Redux
React Native + Expo
 Backend NodeJS
MySQL
 DevOps Docker + Docker Swarm
AWS
Github, Version control
); }
